name: Alberich's Pointed Hat
caption:
Mad Tongue Alberich's pointed hat, a sign of a heretical practitioner. Set with red glintstones, said to be formed by the blood of sacrifices. Alberich was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for thorn sorceries by 6%.
info: Hat of a defected glintstone sorcerer.
vanilla_caption:
Mad Tongue Alberich's pointed hat, a sign of a heretical practitioner.

Set with red glintstones, said to be formed by the blood of sacrifices. Strengthens thorn sorcery.

Alberich was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
vanilla_info: Hat of a defected glintstone sorcerer

name: Spellblade's Pointed Hat
caption:

name: Black Knife Armor
caption:
Scale armor used by the Black Knife Assassins, forged to make no sound. Traces of power yet remain in its concealing veil. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Negates all movement sounds made by the wearer.
info: Armor used by the Black Blade Assassins.
vanilla_caption:
Scale armor used by the Black Knife Assassins, forged to make no sound.

Traces of power yet remain in its concealing veil, which muffles the sound of footsteps.

The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.
vanilla_info: Armor used by the Black Blade Assassins

name: Briar Helm
caption:
Battered iron helm from a foreign land. Worn by Elemer of the Briar. The winding, rusted iron briars are a mark of the guilty, and typically indicate a sentence of death. Elemer murdered numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Inflicts 18 <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> to any enemy in the path of your dodge roll.
info: Helm worn by Condor Knights.
vanilla_caption:
Battered iron helm from a foreign land.
Worn by Elemer of the Briar.

The winding, rusted iron briars are a mark of the guilty, and typically indicate a sentence of death. They also cause this armor to deal damage when performing dodge rolls.

Elemer murdered numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.
vanilla_info: Helm worn by Condor Knights

name: Shining Horned Headband
caption:
Headband decorated by a pair of shining horns. Worn by ancestral follower shamans. Horns with buds that also shine are ideal ceremonial items for ancestral worship.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases the <font color="#E0B985">attack power</font> of Ancestral Infant's Head by 20%.
info: %null%
vanilla_caption:
Headband decorated by a pair of shining horns.
Worn by ancestral follower shamans.

Horns with buds that also shine are ideal ceremonial items for ancestral worship. Strengthens Ancestral Infant's Head.
vanilla_info: %null%

name: Duelist Helm
caption:
Bronze helm decorated with innumerable snakes. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Makes enemies more likely to attack you rather than an online co-op partner. Has no effect in single player.
info: Bronze helm adorned with many snakes.
vanilla_caption:
Bronze helm decorated with innumerable snakes.
Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.

The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.
vanilla_info: Bronze helm adorned with many snakes

name: Guardian Garb (Full Bloom)
caption:
Engraved golden garb. Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees. It is said that the blood-red flowers blooming on their backs mark the senescence of their ancient pact. Perhaps the guardians are part tree already.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases HP restoration from Flask of Crimson Tears by 10%.
info: Armor worn by the people of rotted abundance.
vanilla_caption:
Engraved golden garb.
Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees.

Raises the HP recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears, but greatly lowers fire damage negation.

It is said that the blood-red flowers blooming on their backs mark the senescence of their ancient pact. Perhaps the guardians are part tree already.
vanilla_info: Armor worn by the people of rotted abundance

name: Pumpkin Helm
caption:
An oval helm large enough to cover any head. Very heavy and very hard. The inside of the helm is pitch black, keeping the crazed warrior within from panicking. Perhaps its rather roomy interior also helps alleviate feelings of pressure and claustrophobia.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Reduces damage and impact of headshots.
info: Oval helmet large enough to cover any head.
vanilla_caption:
An oval helm large enough to cover any head.
Very heavy and very hard.

Reduces damage from headshots and impacts.

The inside of the helm is pitch black, keeping the crazed warrior within from panicking.
Perhaps its rather roomy interior also helps alleviate feelings of pressure and claustrophobia.
vanilla_info: Oval helmet large enough to cover any head

name: Queen's Crescent Crown
caption:
A tall crown depicting the moon. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font> by 3.
info: Crown of Rennala, the Full Moon Witch.
vanilla_caption:
A tall crown depicting the moon.
Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. Increases intelligence.

When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him.

And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.
vanilla_info: Crown of Rennala, the Full Moon Witch

name: Godskin Noble Robe
caption:
Robe made by sewing together patches of smooth skin. Subcutaneous fat makes it plump and soft. Worn by Godskin Nobles, known for their seven-face aprons. Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases the <font color="#E0B985">attack power</font> of the Noble Presence incantation by 20%.
info: Robe made from tanned corpulent Demigod skin.
vanilla_caption:
Robe made by sewing together patches of smooth skin.
Subcutaneous fat makes it plump and soft. Worn by Godskin Nobles, known for their seven-face aprons.

Strengthens the Noble Presence incantation.

Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.
vanilla_info: Robe made from tanned corpulent Demigod skin

name: Crucible Axe Helm
caption:
Helm of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. The axe ornamentation is the knight Ordovis's mark, displayed also by his men.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for Aspects of the Crucible incantations by 4%.
info: Helm used by Ordovis of the Crucible and his men.
vanilla_caption:
Helm of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.

name: Lusat's Glintstone Crown
caption:
The giant blue glintstone crown worn by Lusat, primeval current sorcerer. This crown replaced Lusat's brain and skull altogether, and now, removed from his body, it is all but dead.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for primeval current sorceries by 10-15%, but increases FP consumption for sorceries by 15%.
info: Skull-merged Crown of a Crystal Sorcerer.
vanilla_caption:
The giant blue glintstone crown worn by Lusat, primeval current sorcerer.

This crown replaced Lusat's brain and skull altogether, and now, removed from his body, it is all but dead. What power remains within raises the potency of Lusat's primeval current sorceries at the cost of additional FP consumption.
vanilla_info: Skull-merged Crown of a Crystal Sorcerer

name: Azur's Glintstone Crown
caption:
Crown of Azur, primeval current sorcerer, set with a prominent blue-green glintstone. This crown replaced Azur's brain and skull altogether, and now, removed from his body, it is all but dead.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for primeval current sorceries by 10-15%, but increases FP consumption for sorceries by 15%.
info: Blue transparent crown of a Crystal Sorcerer.

vanilla_info: Blue transparent crown of a Crystal Sorcerer

name: White Mask
caption:
Bloodstained, faintly grinning white mask. Worn by war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers. The Lord of Blood's curse enlivens the wearer when bloodletting occurs.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 10% for 20 seconds when <font color="#C84343">blood loss</font> occurs nearby.
info: Strange birch mask that hides one's expression.
vanilla_caption:
Bloodstained, faintly grinning white mask.
Worn by war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers.

The Lord of Blood's curse enlivens the wearer when bloodletting occurs. Slightly raises attack power when there is blood loss nearby.
vanilla_info: Strange birch mask that hides one's expression

name: Royal Remains Helm
caption:
Helm graced with gold human bones. Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing. It is said that the bones belong to an ancient lord―the soulless king. The lord of the lost and desperate, who was known as Ensha.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Restores 2 HP per second while HP is below 18%.
info: Mask that mediates via body of famed ancestor.
vanilla_caption:
Helm graced with gold human bones.
Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.

Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.

It is said that the bones belong to an ancient lord―the soulless king. The lord of the lost and desperate, who was known as Ensha.
vanilla_info: Mask that mediates via body of famed ancestor

name: Royal Remains Armor
caption:
Armor graced with gold human bones. Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing. It is said that the bones belong to an ancient lord―the soulless king. The lord of the lost and desperate, who was known as Ensha.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Restores 2 HP per second while HP is below 18%.
info: Armor that mediates via body of famed ancestor.
vanilla_caption:
Armor graced with gold human bones.
Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.

Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.

It is said that the bones belong to an ancient lord―the soulless king. The lord of the lost and desperate, who was known as Ensha.

name: Crimson Hood
caption:
A hooded cloak of vivid crimson. Worn by expatriated royalty. Such cloaks were gifted to those who departed on journeys without specific orders, to faraway lands from which they would never return. In other words, the gift of a cloak made it easier for undesirables to be on their way.  Roderika never once saw the guidance of grace.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">vigor</font> by 1.
info: Hooded cloak of expatriated royalty.
vanilla_caption:
A hooded cloak of vivid crimson.
Worn by expatriated royalty.
Increases vigor.

Such cloaks were gifted to those who departed on journeys without specific orders, to faraway lands from which they would never return. In other words, the gift of a cloak made it easier for undesirables to be on their way.

Roderika never once saw the guidance of grace.
vanilla_info: Hooded cloak of expatriated royalty

name: Navy Hood
caption:
A hooded cloak of deep navy. Worn by expatriated royalty. Such cloaks were gifted to those who departed on missions to faraway lands, from which they would never return. But what choice did they have, having seen the guidance of grace?


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">mind</font> by 1.

name: Commoner's Garb
caption:
Garb with a thick embroidered cape attached. Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between. The board hung from the neck depicts a sprawling tree, its roots and branches forming two holes. This is a self-imposed shackle, a voluntary display of allegiance to the Erdtree.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">faith</font> by 1.
info: Garb of a rune cursed citizen.
vanilla_caption:
Garb with a thick embroidered cape attached.
Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.

The board hung from the neck depicts a sprawling tree, its roots and branches forming two holes. This is a self-imposed shackle, a voluntary display of allegiance to the Erdtree that increases faith.

name: Envoy Crown
caption:
The soft bundle worn on the head by Oracle Envoys. Densely wrapped in several layers of cloth. No one knows what the cloth hides, but some claim to have heard a faint whimpering from inside. It must have been their imagination.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases the <font color="#E0B985">attack power</font> of bubble-based skills by 15%. This effect does not work for bubble-based sorceries.
info: Head concealing silver robe.
vanilla_caption:
The soft bundle worn on the head by Oracle Envoys.
Densely wrapped in several layers of cloth.

Raises the potency of bubble-based skills.

No one knows what the cloth hides, but some claim to have heard a faint whimpering from inside. It must have been their imagination.
vanilla_info: Head concealing silver robe

name: Twinsage Glintstone Crown
caption:
One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Scholars of the Twinsage Conspectus were the elites of the academy, permitted to study and excel in sorceries of all kinds.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font> by 6, but reduces <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> and <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 9%.
info: Stone mask of the Twin Crystal Sage.
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.

Greatly increases intelligence to the detriment of HP and stamina.

Scholars of the Twinsage Conspectus were the elites of the academy, permitted to study and excel in sorceries of all kinds.
vanilla_info: Stone mask of the Twin Crystal Sage

name: Olivinus Glintstone Crown
caption:
One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. The lineage of the Olivinus Conspectus began with the sorcerer Lusat, and its adherents continue his study of meteors.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font> by 3, but reduces <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 9%.
info: Stone mask of a Gold Amber Sage.

One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.

name: Lazuli Glintstone Crown
caption:
One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Scholars of the Lazuli Conspectus study Carian sorceries—a heterodox pursuit that views the moon as equal to the stars.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font> and <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font> by 3, but reduces <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 18%.
info: Stone mask of a Red Glintstone Sage.
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.

Scholars of the Lazuli Conspectus study Carian sorceries—a heterodox pursuit that views the moon as equal to the stars.
vanilla_info: Stone mask of a Red Glintstone Sage

name: Karolos Glintstone Crown
caption:
One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. The Karolos Conspectus is the oldest of the academy's lineages of study, begat by the sorcerer Azur. Scholars who follow in his footsteps pursue the mysteries of comets.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font> by 3, but reduces <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 9%.
info: Stone mask depicting the wise Karolos.

name: Witch's Glintstone Crown
caption:
One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. This gentle-looking crown was granted to a scholar who excelled in her studies, which also merited the title of "witch."


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font> and <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> by 3, but reduces <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 18%.
info: Stone mask of a Green Glintstone Sage.
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.

Increases intelligence and arcane to the detriment of stamina.

This gentle-looking crown was granted to a scholar who excelled in her studies, which also merited the title of "witch."
vanilla_info: Stone mask of a Green Glintstone Sage

name: Okina Mask
caption:
A wooden mask that depicts an old man baring his teeth. The source of the sobriquet of the great swordsman of the Land of Reeds. The more he sharpened his mind, the more the absurdities of the world came into stark relief. And so Okina renounced it all, and rose to a higher plane. There was only himself. His katana. And its mastery. Before long, Okina became a demon of a swordsman.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font> by 3, but reduces <font color="#E0B985">focus</font> by 50.

<font color="#E0B985">Focus:</font> Resistance to <font color="#A698F4">sleep</font> and <font color="#EEAA2B">madness</font>.
info: Mask adorned with a land of reeds veteran warrior.
vanilla_caption:
A wooden mask that depicts an old man baring his teeth. The source of the sobriquet of the great swordsman of the Land of Reeds.
Raises dexterity as it lowers focus.

The more he sharpened his mind, the more the absurdities of the world came into stark relief. And so Okina renounced it all, and rose to a higher plane. There was only himself. His katana. And its mastery.

Before long, Okina became a demon of a swordsman.
vanilla_info: Mask adorned with a land of reeds veteran warrior

name: Preceptor's Big Hat
caption:
Large hat with the movements of the stars drawn on the inside of the brim. Worn by the magic preceptors who served the Carian royals. Glintstone sorcerers are the descendants of astrologers, a fact that the Carians remain aware of. Even if their fate has been long severed from the stars.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">mind</font> by 3, but reduces <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 9%.
info: Hat worn by ruthless Chaplains.
vanilla_caption:
Large hat with the movements of the stars drawn on the inside of the brim.
Worn by the magic preceptors who served the Carian royals.

Increases mind to the detriment of stamina.

Glintstone sorcerers are the descendants of astrologers, a fact that the Carians remain aware of. Even if their fate has been long severed from the stars.
vanilla_info: Hat worn by ruthless Chaplains

name: Mask of Confidence
caption:
Mask with the mouth sewn shut with gold thread. When Radagon married Rennala, he ordered the Carian magic preceptors to don these masks. To make it clear that all of their matters were to be kept strictly private.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> by 3.
info: Hood worn by ruthless Chaplains.
vanilla_caption:
Mask with the mouth sewn shut with gold thread.
Increases arcane.

vanilla_info: Hood worn by ruthless Chaplains

name: Raptor's Black Feathers
caption:
Robe crafted with the black feathers of a bird of prey. Worn by the assassins of Ravenmount. A ritual implement for transforming into a Deathbird, if only by imitation. "We are birds of prey, bringers of death."


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for jump attacks by 10%.
info: Cloak worn by followers of the deadly birds.
vanilla_caption:
Robe crafted with the black feathers of a bird of prey.
Worn by the assassins of Ravenmount.

A ritual implement for transforming into a Deathbird, if only by imitation.
Strengthens jump attacks.

"We are birds of prey, bringers of death."
vanilla_info: Cloak worn by followers of the deadly birds

name: Consort's Mask
caption:
Mask worn by Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor, in the image of a foreign queen. Long ago, when Rykard first set eyes on Tanith, she was working as a dancer in a foreign land. Soon, he made her his consort. She was the only human to remain by his side when he became the serpent of blasphemy. In that moment, Tanith was truly charmed by him.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font> by 1.
info: White mask of Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor.
vanilla_caption:
Mask worn by Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor, in the image of a foreign queen.
Increases dexterity.

Long ago, when Rykard first set eyes on Tanith, she was working as a dancer in a foreign land. Soon, he made her his consort.
She was the only human to remain by his side when he became the serpent of blasphemy.

In that moment, Tanith was truly charmed by him.
vanilla_info: White mask of Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor

name: Ruler's Mask
caption:
Mask in the image of a wizened sage. Customary dress among lords in a smaller nation. Such a mask illustrates the qualities of an ideal lord: chiefly, wise and possessing a certain defanged geniality. One at the center of society often finds these qualities most expedient.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">faith</font> by 1.
info: Stone mask of Rya, servant to the Volcano Manor.
vanilla_caption:
Mask in the image of a wizened sage.
Customary dress among lords in a smaller nation.
Increases faith.

One at the center of society often finds these qualities most expedient.
vanilla_info: Stone mask of Rya, servant to the Volcano Manor

name: Marais Mask
caption:
Mask in the image of a white-haired young noble. Customarily worn by the head of House Marais. The Marais family has a dual history spanning generations, serving as both executioners and castellans of the Shaded Castle. This mask bears the likeness of the first of their line.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> by 1.
info: An eerie white haired silver mask.
vanilla_caption:
Mask in the image of a white-haired young noble.
Customarily worn by the head of House Marais.
Increases arcane.

vanilla_info: An eerie white haired silver mask

name: Omen Helm
caption:
Malformed helm resembling an Omen with its horns cut off. Worn by the Dung Eater, its form is a vision of the landscape of his mind, and of his appearance as he wished to see it. The heart of an Omen without the body to match; could there be any crueler existence? What does it matter, then, if the curse claims it all?


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases the <font color="#E0B985">attack power</font> of Omen Bairn and Regal Omen Bairn by 5%.
info: Mask of a curse gnawed Omen.
vanilla_caption:
Malformed helm resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.

name: Haima Glintstone Crown
caption:
One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Scholars of the Haima Conspectus sought the power to quell conflict, and to this end studied the sorceries of cannon fire and the gavel.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font> and <font color="#E0B985">strength</font> by 2, but reduces <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> by 9%.

name: Snow Witch Hat
caption:
Witch's pointed hat, frigid and frozen through. Of a style associated with practitioners of heretical sorcery. Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries. It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her. That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for cold sorceries by 10%.
info: Hat worn by Enchantress Ranni.
vanilla_caption:
Witch's pointed hat, frigid and frozen through.
Of a style associated with practitioners of heretical sorcery.
Strengthens cold sorcery.

name: Radiant Gold Mask
caption:
A mask designed to resemble a blazing golden halo. Created and left behind by Lord Goldmask, a staunch pursuer of Golden Order fundamentalism. Its striking design represents both the brilliant inspiration that once shone upon him, and the vision of a ring that he will surely find at the end of his pursuit. "To you who seek to shine as I do, wear it well!"


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for Golden Order incantations by 10%.
info: Mask worn by researchers of the Golden Order.

A mask designed to resemble a blazing golden halo.

caption:

<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> by 4, but reduces the HP restoration from Flask of Crimson Tears by 10%.

name: Silver Tear Mask
caption:
Mask fashioned from the corpse of a formless Silver Tear, supported by its hardened, shed husk. To imitate the imitator is a cunning play indeed.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> by 8, but reduces <font color="#F395C4">physical attack power</font> by 5%.
info: Head covering formed from silver tears.
vanilla_caption:
Mask fashioned from the corpse of a formless Silver Tear, supported by its hardened, shed husk.

Greatly increases arcane to the detriment of physical attack power.

To imitate the imitator is a cunning play indeed.
vanilla_info: Head covering formed from silver tears

name: Jar
caption:
Jar that fits cleanly over the head when upturned. Made with pride by Iron Fist Alexander.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for throwing pot items by 15%.
info: This sturdy jar might serve well as a helm.
vanilla_caption:
Jar that fits cleanly over the head when upturned.
Made with pride by Iron Fist Alexander.

In a uniquely jarlike gesture of friendship, it boosts the power of throwing pot items.
vanilla_info: This sturdy jar might serve well as a helm

name: Nox Mirrorhelm
caption: Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass. One among the Eternal City's ritual implements. Weak against striking attacks. Worn by those committed to high treason, it wards off the intervention of the Greater Will and its vassal Fingers.
info: Shining helm decorated with a mirror.
vanilla_caption:
Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass.
One among the Eternal City's ritual implements.
Easily broken and weak against striking attacks.

Worn by those committed to high treason, it wards off the intervention of the Greater Will and its vassal Fingers.
vanilla_info: Shining helm decorated with a mirror

name: Iji's Mirrorhelm
caption: Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass, said to have never left War Counselor Iji's head. Weak against striking attacks. Worn by those committed to high treason, it wards off the intervention of the Greater Will and its vassal Fingers. Iji was afraid. Terrified of his own treachery.

name: Greathood
caption:
Hood far larger than the head it is meant to cover. A burial shroud of sorts for those who discover, at long last, the truth they sought. "Yes, surely this is the moon that young Rennala gazed upon."


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font> and <font color="#E0B985">faith</font> by 2, but reduces <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 9%.

caption:

caption:
Extremely thin and sheer white dress worn by the Deathbed Companion as she embraces the dead. The touch of the fabric is exceedingly soft, so as not to harm even the most withered corpse, while still sharing her warmth.

name: Mushroom Crown
caption:
Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushrooms form a towering headpiece. Long ago, great lords served the scarlet rot. Perhaps such fungal bodies served as their crowns.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 10% for 20 seconds when <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> or <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font> occurs nearby.
info: Garland crown of large flowers rotted by poison.
vanilla_caption:
Mushrooms found growing all over the body.
These overgrown mushrooms form a towering headpiece.

name: Black Dumpling
caption:
Mask forced on a victim's head to lend torture an extra degree of cruelty. It magnifies one's fears and makes them acutely aware of all forms of pain. When the Black Dumpling goes on, the torturer no longer seeks answers; only to inflict suffering without hope of relief.


<font color="#C0B194">Passive Effect:</font>
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 10% for 60 seconds when the wearer suffers from <font color="#EEAA2B">madness</font>.
info: Red cloth blindfold used to cover prisoners' eyes.
